source.label: Info for those with normal blood pressure

cards.detail: {{#patient}}You recently had high blood pressure readings (> 130 systolic or > 80 diastolic), but do not have a recorded diagnosis of hypertension. You may want to discuss with your care team.{{/patient}}{{#careTeam}}Patient had multiple blood pressure readings of SBP > 130mm Hg and/or DBP > 80. This suggests the patient may have Stage 1 Hypertension, but no diagnosis was found.{{/careTeam}}|https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYPERTENSIONAHA.120.15026|[ { "label": "Contact care team diagnosis", "actions": ["{{#patient}} Contact your care team about high blood presure diagnosis {{/patient}}"] } ]|at-most-one|https://www.heart.org/en/health-topics/high-blood-pressure/understanding-blood-pressure-readings
